thread.title: Lewis: UConn's defense hasn't been all that special

author: Lee Lewis Republican-American
title: Lewis: UConn's defense hasn't been all that special
text:
Saturday, October 3, 2015 11:49 PM EDT 
Lewis: UConn's defense hasn't been all that special By Lee Lewis Republican-American Connecticut head coach Bob Diaco reacts in the second half during an NCAA college football game against BYU, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Provo, Utah.
